# CN 12 in ES

[Enterprise Survey](https://www.enterprisesurveys.org/) is a face-to-face and firm-level data, conducted by __World Bank.__
I take __China__ in __2012__ for example.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(foreign)
china<-read.dta(file="C:/Users/CJY/Desktop/to_IISAS/China-2012-full ES N2700 data.dta")
attach(china)
```

# Basic detail, Industry 

First, we need to know some basic detail about this data. I want to see the distribution of these firm's industry.

#
```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
industryplot<-ggplot(china, aes(a4a))+
  geom_bar()+
  coord_flip()
industryplot
ggsave("industryplot.png")
```

![](industryplot.png)

# IT and Retail

```{r}
a4a<-ITandRetail
ITandRetail <- NA
ITandRetail[a4a = "IT" ] <- 1
ITandRetail[a4a = "Retail" ] <- 2
table(ITandRetail)

ownership<-ggplot(china$a4a, aes(b2a, b2b))
```
